item.title: About Me
item.description: I graduated from the University of Virginia in 2014 with a degree in Economics. After school, I took a full-time position at the Federal Reserve Board as a financial systems analyst and have been there for about three and a half years. I currently reside in the DC metropolitan area. Skills: R SAS SQL Data Analysis Have ideas? Feel free to get in touch! Pickles Theme - Theme by mismith0227

item.title: NBA 2016-17 Backcourt Tandems - A Brief Look
item.description: Introduction In recent years the NBA has been shifting to favor guard-oriented play highlighted by dynamic pairs such as the Golden State Warriors’s Steph Curry and Klay Thompson and the Wizard’s John Wall and Bradley Beal just to name a few.
